description:
The PeerConnection. (/_/webrtc/**$peer1_deviceId**-**$peer2_deviceId**/connections/**$peerCoId**/). 

---
There should be 2 <PeerConnectionDevice>, one for each device, identified by their **$deviceId**:
- /_/webrtc/**$peer1_deviceId**-**$peer2_deviceId**/connections/**$peerCoId**/**$peer1_deviceId**/*<PeerConnectionDevice>*
- /_/webrtc/**$peer1_deviceId**-**$peer2_deviceId**/connections/**$peerCoId**/**$peer2_deviceId**/*<PeerConnectionDevice>*
